deprecated_yaml.title: The Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD) Weather Warnings YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD) Weather Warnings using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD) Weather Warnings YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
